name: ltsub2dd
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wbr(co(c0, cmin, c1), clt, co(c0, cmin, c2)))

stmt.origin: mpbid(w0, wbr(co(c0, cmin, c1), clt, co(c0, cmin, c2)), wbr(c2, clt, c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(co(c0, cmin, c1), clt, co(c0, cmin, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c2, clt, c1))
-| wi(w0, wb(wbr(c2, clt, c1), wbr(co(c0, cmin, c1), clt, co(c0, cmin, c2))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(co(c0, cmin, c1), clt, co(c0, cmin, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c2, clt, c1))
-| wi(w0, wb(wbr(c2, clt, c1), wbr(co(c0, cmin, c1), clt, co(c0, cmin, c2))))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wbr(c2, clt, c1), wbr(co(c0, cmin, c1), clt, co(c0, cmin, c2))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(co(c0, cmin, c1), clt, co(c0, cmin, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c2, clt, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))

comment: Subtraction of both sides of 'less than'. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-May-2016.)
